titles.title: Jesus Shall Take The Highest Honour

properties.copyright: 1985 Sovereign Lifestyle Music, Administered by Sovereign Lifestyle Music, Ltd.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A
Jesus shall take the highest honor
Jesus shall take the highest place
Let all earth join hands in exalting
The Name which is above all other names

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let's bow the knee in humble adoration
For at His name every knee must bow
Every tongue confess
He is Christ God's only Son
Sovereign Lord we give You glory now

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For all honor and blessing and power
Belong to You, belong to You
All honor and blessing and power
Belong to You, belong to You
Lord Jesus Christ,
Son of the living God
